channel.title: Dongsheng
channel.description: Passion in cloud security, data analysis, and automation.

item.title: Field Data Analyzer
item.author: Dongsheng Mu
item.description: Field Data Analyzer is an expert system framework designed for troubleshooting, which analyses vast amount of field escalation data with a set of analytical engines, based on an extensible knowledge base.

item.title: A DevTest framework called Jellyfish
item.author: Dongsheng Mu
item.description: Jellyfish is a Transparent and Flexible test framework, with Tentacles to pull things together.
